metadata.subject: Young Iranians Push Boundaries / Limits in Rape Cases Under Review

relationships.description: Newly married couple featured in the article

analysis.purpose: To report on social changes in Iran and legal developments regarding statute of limitations for sex crimes
analysis.significance: Documents cultural shifts in Iran and legal debates around statutes of limitations for sexual assault cases

notable_quotes: "We represent the change in society," Kodeiri says.

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present

illegal_activity.description: This is a news article reporting on social trends and legal matters, not evidence of first-hand illegal activity

details: Reporting by Shashank Bengali and Ramin Mostaghim

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be a published news article from the Los Angeles Times about cultural changes in Iran and legal issues surrounding statutes of limitations for sexual assault cases

analysis.summary: This Los Angeles Times article covers two main stories: young Iranians pushing cultural boundaries with Western-inspired weddings and lifestyles, and legal debates around statutes of limitations for sexual assault cases, including mention of Bill Cosby allegations.
